title: SciFi Warrior Viktor: Armored Soldier Character
description: SciFi Warrior Viktor is a highly detailed, PBR, armored soldier character rigged to the Epic Skeleton and compatible with all marketplace animations.
longDescription:
Video: youtube.com/watch?v=fBO_taV3uRw&feature=youtu.be

Sketchfab: https://skfb.ly/6AnN9


Join the Discord server for discounts, support, and discussion: https://discord.gg/CvV2MHk


SciFi Warrior Viktor is a highly detailed, PBR, armored soldier character rigged to the Epic Skeleton and compatible with all marketplace animations. The character's style is suitable for near-future and far-future sci fi aesthetics. Eight camouflage patterns are included to use in material instances. The master material includes many parameters for customizing the colors of different sections of the character. Six instances are included and infinite variations are possible. There is an optional mesh for eye lenses, and an optional should insignia. The eyes utilize a realistic shader with mathematically correct refraction.


Check out our seller page for other great products. https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/profile/Black%20Fang%20Technologies

Be sure to comment any suggestions, concerns, or praises down bellow. If you buy, be sure to leave a rating.

Reach out to us at xbl.black.fang@gmail.com for support.

Follow us on Twitter @BlackFangTech for updates and special offers.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  One high-detail PBR character, near-future science fiction style
  •  Optional lenses mesh to cover eyes
  •  Eight camo pattern textures included
  • Six material instances included, infinite variations possible
  • Realistic eye shader with refraction mathematics
  • Optional emblem/insignia
  • Female version of mesh

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes [Actually rigged to Epic skeleton, no retargetting shenanigans. Just consolidate skeleton assets.]

Number of characters: 1

Vertex counts of characters: 4482, 4526

Number of Textures: 20

Texture Resolutions: 4096, 2048, 1024, 512

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows
